# Alpha diversity

## By unique participants

```{r}


plot_richness(phylo_data, x="SubjectID2", 
              measures = c("Observed", "Shannon", "Simpson"))+
  labs(x="Subject ID")


```


## Boxplots by week of study

```{r}


plot_richness(phylo_data, x="Week",
              measures = c("Observed", "Shannon", "Simpson"))+
  geom_boxplot(aes(group=Week, color=Week))+
  geom_point(aes(color=Week))+
  labs(x="Week of Study")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 0, hjust=0.33))


```


## Boxplots by Intervention

```{r}


plot_richness(phylo_data, x="Intervention",
              measures = c("Observed", "Shannon", "Simpson"))+
  geom_boxplot(aes(group=Intervention, color=Intervention))+
  geom_point(aes(color=Intervention))+
  labs(x="Intervention Group")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 0, hjust=0.33))

plot_richness(phylo_data, x="Intervention",
              measures = c("Observed", "Shannon", "Simpson"))+
  geom_boxplot(aes(group=Intervention, color=Intervention))+
  geom_point(aes(color=Intervention))+
  facet_grid(.~Week)+
  labs(x="Intervention Group by Week")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 0, hjust=0.33))


```
